GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
bfq: Avoid merging queues with different parents

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit a16c65cca7d2c7ff965fdd3adc8df2156529caf1, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 430a67f9d6169a7b3e328bceb2ef9542e4153c7c. For more details please see the references link.
